metaTitle: Take-Home Pay Calculator | Paycheck Calculator | SalaryWise.io
metaDescription: Calculate your actual take-home pay after taxes and deductions. Free paycheck calculator with federal, state, and FICA taxes.

intro.title: Calculate Your Take-Home Pay
intro.description: Find out exactly how much you'll take home from your paycheck. Our calculator accounts for federal income tax, FICA taxes, state taxes, and common deductions.

faqs.question: What's the difference between gross and take-home pay?
faqs.answer: Gross pay is your total earnings before any deductions. Take-home pay is what you actually receive after taxes and withholdings are subtracted.

faqs.question: What taxes are included?
faqs.answer: We include federal income tax, FICA taxes (Social Security and Medicare), and state income tax. Additional local taxes may apply.

faqs.question: How accurate are these calculations?
faqs.answer: These are estimates based on current tax rates. Consult a tax professional for personalized advice.

faqs.question: Can I include pre-tax deductions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can include 401(k) contributions and health insurance premiums as pre-tax deductions.

tips: Use your actual take-home pay for budgeting
